name: Vortex
comment: Frequency in Hz ( 1: y [l/min] = 0,0835 * x [Hz] - 0,03, 2: y [l/min] = 0,185 * x [Hz] )

name: LegioStartTime
comment: Time when LegioProtect starts on specific day

name: ActualKrm
comment: Krm used for calculation (set in DynamicTnm), valid after 1. Tapping

name: ActualTnm
comment: Tnm used for calculation (set in DynamicTnm), valid after 1. Tapping
